markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 7" pfs="Standard">[Untwisting Iron Augmentation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1253)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 223</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks are treated as [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) and [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379), they gain the [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55) trait, and they gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls per damage die.

---
**Heightened (9th)** Your unarmed attacks are also treated as [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374).
name: Untwisting Iron Augmentation
